alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 11:44AM CDT until May 18 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. .Additional rises from heavy rainfall are anticipated along the Goose River. It is expected to reach Minor flood stage by the late weekend period. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Some overbank flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 11.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
